attributes.action: Launch an independent enquiry into islamophobia within the Conservative party.
attributes.background: During the mayoral election campaign the Conservative candidate Zac Goldamith has used inflammatory and offensive language against his apponent, Sadiq Khan, linking him to extremism because he is a muslim. MPs and the PM use negative language in parliament when talking about muslims and refugees.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is a matter for the Conservative Party.
